title: Grape vine

properties.name: description
properties.value: Grape vines can be grown from grape seeds in the Vinery when players have obtained 65% Hosidius favour and 36 farming. The plants are being watched over by Gallow, so they will not catch disease or die prematurely. A grape vine will die when all grapes have been picked.

content:
This article is about the vines grown in the vinery. For the vines in the Garden of Tranquility quest, see vines (Garden of Tranquillity).

Map
Advanced data
Object ID11759,11760

Grape vines can be grown from grape seeds in the Vinery when players have obtained 65% Hosidius favour and 36 farming. The plants are being watched over by Gallow, so they will not catch disease or die prematurely. A grape vine will die when all grapes have been picked.

Once grown, the grapes can be picked. When a player has a Bologa's blessing in their inventory, picking grapes from the tree will give Zamorak grapes and remove one blessing from the inventory. Picking grapes from the vine is similar to picking herbs from bushes; the amount of grapes picked is not fixed, but it is at least 5.

Besides these vines, there are other grapevines in the vinery that are not grown for the player.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Harvesting XP 40 xp
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Grapes5–10Always[d 1]180–3600
Zamorak's grapes5–10Always[d 2]8,000–16,000150–300
  1. ^ Not when carrying Bologa's blessing.
  2. ^ Uses up one Bologa's blessing per picked bunch.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The models for the sixth and seventh growth stage appear to be swapped by mistake, making it appear to grow backwards for a stage before fully grown.

'''Grape vines''' can be grown from [[grape seeds]] in the [[Vinery]] when players have obtained 65% [[Hosidius]] favour and 36 [[farming]]. The plants are being watched over by [[Gallow]], so they will not catch disease or die prematurely. A grape vine will die when all grapes have been picked.

Once grown, the [[grapes]] can be picked. When a player has a [[Bologa's blessing]] in their inventory, picking grapes from the tree will give [[Zamorak grapes]] and remove one blessing from the inventory.
Picking grapes from the vine is similar to picking [[herbs]] from bushes; the amount of grapes picked is not fixed, but it is at least 5.

Besides these vines, there are other [[grapevine|grapevines]] in the vinery that are not grown for the player.
